item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part I: Horizon
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Part I - A guide how to setup a VMware Horizon Connection Server, the installation, configuration and preperation of the Linux distributions Ubuntu and CentOS and how you can turn them into a universal workbench for development and operations.

item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part II: Applications
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Part II - In this post I´m going to list a couple of applications which I´m using for my desktop and how you can easily install them from your shell.

item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part III: Shell
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Part III - A guide on the "Highway" to Shell.
